subject: Re: [junit] Injection in Constructor V @Before
msgSnippet: It s just not possible to set an instance field of an object before its constructor has completed.  This limitation will affect all extensions. David
messageBody:
It's just not possible to set an instance field of an object before
its constructor has completed. This limitation will affect all
extensions.

David
